creditCards.name: Capital One Venture Rewards Credit Card
creditCards.reward_details: Unlimited 2x miles on everyday purchases, 5x miles on hotels, vacations and travel.

creditCards.name: American Express Gold Card
creditCards.reward_details: 4x membership rewards on restaurants worldwide, 4x membership reward points at U.S. supermarkets (up to $25,000), 3x membership reward points on flights booked through AMEX.

creditCards.name: Chase Sapphire Preferred Card
creditCards.reward_details: 5x points on travel through Chase Travel, 3x on dining, streaming services and online groceries, 2x on other travel purposes, 1x on all other purchases.

creditCards.name: Chase Freedom Unlimited
creditCards.reward_details: 5% cash back on travel through Chase Travel, 3% cash back on dining and drugstore purchases, unlimited 1.5% cash back on all else.

creditCards.name: The Platinum Card from American Express
creditCards.reward_details: 5x membership reward points on flights booked directly with airlines or with AMEX travel up to $500,000, 5x membership reward points on prepaid hotels booked through American Express Travel. 1x reward points on all other purchases.

creditCards.name: Chase Sapphire Reserve
creditCards.reward_details: 5x total points on flights and 10x total points on hotels and car rentals through Chase Travel, immediately after the first $300 is spent on travel purchases annually. 3x points on all other travel and dining, 1 point per $1 spent on all other purchases.

creditCards.name: Capital One Venture X Rewards Credit Card
creditCards.reward_details: Unlimited 10x miles on hotels and rental cars through Capital One Travel, 5x miles on flights and vacation rentals through Capital One Travel, unlimited 2x miles on all other purchases.

creditCards.name: Wells Fargo Autograph Card
creditCards.reward_details: Unlimited 3x points on restaurants, travel, gas stations, transit, streaming services, and phone plans. 1x points on all other purchases.
